sources.name: Eventbrite.ca
sources.description: Discover and create local events in Toronto. From workshops to concerts, find it all on Canada's largest event platform.

sources.name: Meetup.com
sources.description: Find local groups and events in Toronto. Connect with people who share your interests, from tech to hiking.

sources.name: Ticketmaster
sources.description: Concerts, sports, and major entertainment events. The go-to source for high-profile Toronto happenings.

sources.name: StubHub
sources.description: Buy and sell event tickets. Great for last-minute tickets to sold-out shows.

sources.name: Fever
sources.description: Curated experiences and events in Toronto. Discover unique pop-ups, candlelight concerts, and immersive experiences.

sources.name: Destination Toronto Events
sources.description: Official tourism events calendar. Perfect for visitors and locals looking for the best of Toronto.

sources.name: Toronto.com Events
sources.description: Comprehensive event listings covering everything from community gatherings to major concerts.

sources.name: BlogTO Events
sources.description: Popular local blog event listings. The pulse of what's happening in Toronto right now.

sources.name: TOREVENT.ca
sources.description: Independent Toronto events calendar. Community-driven event discovery.

sources.name: City of Toronto Events
sources.description: Official city events and festivals. Free and family-friendly events across the city.

sources.name: NOW Toronto
sources.description: Events and entertainment guide. Toronto's alternative voice for arts and culture.

sources.name: Toronto Jazz Festival
sources.description: Annual jazz festival and year-round events. World-class jazz in the heart of the city.

sources.name: Massey Hall
sources.description: Historic concert venue. Legendary performances since 1894. Recently restored to its former glory.

sources.name: Roy Thomson Hall
sources.description: Premier concert venue. Home to the Toronto Symphony Orchestra and international acts.

sources.name: Scotiabank Arena
sources.description: Major concerts and events. Toronto's largest indoor venue for superstar performances.

sources.name: Budweiser Stage
sources.description: Outdoor concert venue. Summer concerts with the beautiful Ontario Place backdrop.

sources.name: Danforth Music Hall
sources.description: Live music venue. Intimate setting for indie and established artists.

sources.name: The Phoenix
sources.description: Concert venue for rock, indie, and electronic music. Historic venue with great sound.

sources.name: The Drake Hotel
sources.description: Live music and events. Underground acts in a hip setting.

sources.name: History Toronto
sources.description: New music venue. Modern space for contemporary acts.

sources.name: Rogers Centre
sources.description: Stadium concerts and major events. Home to massive stadium shows.

sources.name: TIFF
sources.description: Major film festival and year-round screenings. One of the world's most prestigious film events.

sources.name: Art Gallery of Ontario
sources.description: Art exhibitions and events. World-class collection with rotating special exhibitions.

sources.name: Royal Ontario Museum
sources.description: Museum events and exhibitions. Dinosaurs, world cultures, and special exhibitions.

sources.name: Hot Docs
sources.description: Documentary film festival. North America's largest documentary festival.

sources.name: Luminato Festival
sources.description: Arts and culture festival. Multi-disciplinary arts festival transforming the city.

sources.name: Nuit Blanche
sources.description: All-night contemporary art event. Free art installations across the city overnight.

sources.name: Toronto Arts Council
sources.description: Arts and cultural events calendar. Supporting the local arts community.

sources.name: Mirvish Productions
sources.description: Broadway shows and theatre. The best of Broadway comes to Toronto through Mirvish.

sources.name: TAPA
sources.description: Toronto Alliance for the Performing Arts. Theatre information and hipTIX for students.

sources.name: Second City Toronto
sources.description: Comedy shows and improv. Where many SNL stars got their start.

sources.name: Comedy Bar
sources.description: Stand-up comedy venue. Local and touring comedians in an intimate setting.

sources.name: Yuk Yuk's Toronto
sources.description: Comedy club. Canada's premier comedy chain featuring top talent.

sources.name: Young People's Theatre
sources.description: Family-friendly theatre. Professional theatre for young audiences.

sources.name: Toronto Blue Jays
sources.description: Baseball games at Rogers Centre. Canada's team in the MLB.

sources.name: Toronto Raptors
sources.description: NBA Basketball games at Scotiabank Arena. 2019 NBA Champions.

sources.name: Toronto Maple Leafs
sources.description: NHL Hockey games at Scotiabank Arena. One of the NHL's Original Six teams.

sources.name: Toronto FC
sources.description: Soccer matches at BMO Field. MLS Cup champions bringing the beautiful game.

sources.name: Toronto Argonauts
sources.description: CFL football games. The oldest professional football team in North America.

sources.name: Toronto Marlies
sources.description: AHL hockey games. Maple Leafs' development team with affordable family fun.

sources.name: CNE (Canadian National Exhibition)
sources.description: Annual summer fair. Rides, food, concerts, and exhibitions at Exhibition Place.

sources.name: Toronto Pride
sources.description: Pride festival and parade. One of the world's largest Pride celebrations.

sources.name: Toronto Caribbean Carnival
sources.description: Caribbean cultural celebration. Vibrant parade and festivities celebrating Caribbean culture.

sources.name: Taste of the Danforth
sources.description: Greek food festival. Canada's largest street festival celebrating Greek culture and cuisine.

sources.name: Royal Agricultural Winter Fair
sources.description: Agricultural fair and horse show. The world's largest combined indoor agricultural fair.

sources.name: Community Festivals
sources.description: Local community events. Neighborhood festivals and celebrations throughout the year.

sources.name: Toronto Restaurants Events
sources.description: Food events and dining. Special dining experiences and restaurant happenings.

sources.name: Toronto Craft Beer
sources.description: Beer festivals and events. Celebrating Ontario's craft brewing scene.

sources.name: Taste of Toronto
sources.description: Premier food festival. Sample dishes from Toronto's best restaurants.

sources.name: BlogTO Food
sources.description: Toronto news, events, and guides. The go-to source for new restaurants and food trends.

sources.name: Toronto Star Entertainment
sources.description: Local entertainment news. Canada's largest daily newspaper covering Toronto events.

sources.name: CP24
sources.description: Local news and events. Toronto's breaking news source with event coverage.

sources.name: NOW Toronto
sources.description: Events and entertainment guide. Alternative weekly with comprehensive listings.

sources.name: Narcity Toronto
sources.description: Local events and things to do. Millennial-focused guide to Toronto life.

sources.name: UnityMaps on TikTok
sources.description: Follow for interesting map content and visualizations of Toronto events and locations.
